name: Pursuit for Gaia
description:
PURSUIT OF GAIA IS A STORY-BASED RPG, BUILT WITH A MISSION TO ENCOURAGE PEOPLE TO PROTECT OUR EARTH.

The game is a collaboration project with Ambassadors of Earth, a team of passionate environmentalists based in Dhaka, Bangladesh.

Synopsis:

You start as an Intern in Ambassadors of Earth, a non-governmental environmentalist organisation. Your job is to limit and greatly reduce the increasing pollution that is harming our Earth, and raise awareness for it. You travel to cities and lands where you battle the pollution giants. With the help of your teammates and peers, you go on the journey of saving our Earth!
